content: I didn't notice any damage to my phone's body or screen while using the old case, but it was getting pretty close. The edges were starting to crack and it was just looking really worn out. When I got my new case, I was looking for something simple and subtle, so I got a black case with a subtle design. It's been working out great so far. I do have a screen protector on my phone, but it's been on there for a while now and it's starting to show some wear. Maybe I should consider getting a new one. Do you have any recommendations for good screen protectors?
